text: *Kasper Juul Hermansen* posted an update for *Daily Standup*

attachments.fallback:
How do you feel today?
I feel great
attachments.title: How do you feel today?

attachments.fallback:
What did you do since yesterday?
Yesterday, I worked on fixing up our documents and utilizing a new git structure.
attachments.text: Yesterday, I worked on fixing up our documents and utilizing a new git structure.
attachments.title: What did you do since yesterday?

attachments.fallback:
What will you do today?
Today, I will work mainly on our documents, the goal is to get the Formulation of a problem done, the same for requirements specification. If I get tired of writing, I might begin splitting up some of our services.
attachments.text: Today, I will work mainly on our documents, the goal is to get the Formulation of a problem done, the same for requirements specification. If I get tired of writing, I might begin splitting up some of our services.
attachments.title: What will you do today?

attachments.pretext:
Participation: *50%*
Keep up the good work! :tada:
